item.title: Different Types of Security Login Standards for Applications
item.description: This article is about the diffrent types of security standards used for logging into applications Security Login Standards The three main standards I will focus this article on are: HTTP Basic Auth - Least secure OAuth - More secure SAML - Most secure HTTP Bassic Authentication This method is fairly easy to implement on web servers like Apache & Nginx that serve webite content in a variety of diffrent formats and languages, the main being HTML and PHP.
